ticket.title: lighttpd+fcgi can't auto load metal?
ticket.original-body:
my server used lighttpd and fcgi
RAILS_ROOT/app/metal/poller.rb #### class Poller def call(env) if env["PATH_INFO"] =~ /^\/poller/ [200, {"Content-Type" => "text/html"}, "Hello, World!"] else [404, {"Content-Type" => "text/html"}, "Not Found"] end end end ####
I start WEBrick server on localhost is ok $curl http://localhost:3000/poller return "Hello, World!"
but i remote access : http://www.mydomain.com/poller it's return "404 Not Found"
why? Can not auto load metal on fcgi?
